meanings.definition: To become familiar with someone or something again.
meanings.sent1: After years apart, they are reacquainting themselves with each other's lives.
meanings.sent2: She is reacquainting herself with the city she grew up in.
meanings.sent3: The cat is reacquainting itself with the old toy it used to play with.
meanings.sent4: The sun is reacquainting the flowers with its warm rays after a long winter.
meanings.sent5: Reacquainting with an old hobby can bring back fond memories.

meanings.definition: The act of renewing a previous acquaintance or familiarity.
meanings.sent1: Their reacquainting was filled with laughter and shared memories.
meanings.sent2: The reacquainting of old friends brought joy to the gathering.
meanings.sent3: The reacquainting of the siblings led to a hilarious trip down memory lane.
meanings.sent4: The reacquainting of the town with its history revitalized community pride.
meanings.sent5: The reacquainting of the student with their favorite subject sparked new interest.
